title: Mid Laner Looking for a team to have fun with
body: I just started playing League again after an 18 month Hiatus. I was Plat in the past and placed Gold 5 last week and I am already Gold 3. I mained/main Ekko with pretty good stats before and after my break, and have Lux, Anivia, and Brand as good back ups. Could play and learn other champions too if Necessary.
